instruction: How far in advance are agendas posted under the City of Lakeview – Public Meeting Notice and Comment Policy?
context:

response: Agendas are posted at least 72 hours in advance.

instruction: Summarize the vendor registration and thresholds in the City of Silverton Procurement Thresholds and Vendor Registration.
context:
City of Silverton Procurement Thresholds and Vendor Registration
Vendor Registration: Requires W-9 and E-Verify enrollment.
Purchasing Thresholds: Under $5000 – one quote; $5000 to $20000 – at least three quotes; over $20000 – formal sealed bid.
Local Preference: Bids from local vendors may receive up to 5% preference.
response: Registration requires W-9 and E-Verify; under $5000 one quote; $5000–$20000 three quotes; over $20000 formal sealed bid; local preference up to 5%.

Start of Service: Collection begins 5 days after the storm emergency is lifted.
Private Property: Residents are responsible for tree removal on private property.
